title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Last HSM Standing: PayPal POS’s move to AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最后的HSM守护者：PayPal POS迁移至AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
abstract: Join Zettle by Paypal as they reveal how one of Europe's most innovative point-of-sale vendors is using AWS Payment Cryptography to retire their last on-premise hardware. Learn how they successfully migrated real-time transaction volumes in multiple geographies while maintaining PCI PIN & PCI P2PE compliance, increasing resiliency, and reducing infrastructure costs.
abstract_cn: 加入 Zettle by PayPal，了解欧洲最具创新性的销售点供应商之一如何使用 AWS Payment Cryptography 淘汰其最后的本地硬件。了解他们如何在多个地理区域成功迁移实时交易量，同时保持 PCI PIN 和 PCI P2PE 合规性，提高弹性并降低基础设施成本。
